metadata.Description: The use of less energy to provide the same level of output or service, resulting in reduced energy consumption, cost savings, and environmental benefits.

energy efficiency.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.
Energy efficiency employs energy audits to identify energy-saving opportunities and optimize energy use.
Energy efficiency collaborates with industries to develop and implement energy-saving measures and technologies.
Energy efficiency supports the integration of renewable energy sources into the energy system to improve overall energy efficiency.
Energy efficiency administers energy efficiency programs to promote energy-saving behaviors and technologies.
Energy efficiency measures energy performance to assess the effectiveness of energy-saving initiatives.
Energy efficiency aligns with the Sustainable Development Goals by contributing to the goal of affordable and clean energy for all.
Energy efficiency is an instance of energy conservation, which aims to reduce energy consumption and waste.
